item.title: Setting up Amazon Web Services
item.description: To setting up Amazon Web Services, the process of setting up an EC2 on Amazon Web Services (AWS) is not complicated, all you need to get a server up and running are Apache, PHP,Â  MySQL. Here are some initial steps that help you get started:
